explains: v. 由……组成，由……构成；在于，存在于

sentences.en: True education does not consist in simply being taught facts.
sentences.cn: 真正的教育并不在于简单地讲授事实。

sentences.en: Most consist of timber frames that rest on stone blocks.
sentences.cn: 大部分由木框架组成，木框架放置在石块上。

sentences.en: Happiness does not consist in how many possessions you own.
sentences.cn: 幸福不在于你拥有多少财产。
